import{useState} from 'react' import {Card, Image} from 'semantic-ui-react' import VinylModal from './VinylModal' function VinylCard({vinyl}){ const {id, band_name, album_name, image_url, year_released} = vinyl const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false) function handlePopUp(){ setShowModal(!showModal) } return (
{album_name} {band_name} {year_released}
) } export default VinylCard
